description: Pickled Carrots and Fennel is an easy, quick, tangy snack. Itâ€™s a little bit spicy, crunchy, and flavorful! Add them to sandwiches, tacos, green salads, or just enjoy them as a healthy, low-calorie snack.
keywords: gluten-free, kosher, passover, vegetarian, pickling, pickled vegetables
name: Pickled Carrots and Fennel
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup seasoned rice vinegar or 1/2 of white or apple cider vinegar with 1 tbsp of sugar
1 tsp red pepper flakes or Aleppo Pepper or to taste (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the carrots and fennel in a large glass jar or in a 4 cup mason jar

In a large heat-proof container, dissolve the sugar (if using) and salt in the boiling water, then add the vinegars and ginger. Pour over the fennel and carrots until the jar is completely filled. Add the hot red pepper flakes
Close the jar tightly, shake so everything is combined and refrigerate for 2 hours or longer
